title: Intergenerational Vitality Resilience
description: Detects when vitality, strength, and skilled activity are preserved across decades and generations, resisting cultural narratives of decline. Affirms memory of active elders as counter-baseline.
indicators: Elders engaged in physical/mechanical labor or creative building
Recognition of vitality across family lines or cultural traditions
Designs and policies supporting activity in later life
Narratives affirming resilience instead of decline
